title: Toxic players are adding me as their friend.
body:
Hey everyone I'm a diamond player and I've noticed whenever I have a poor performance or toxic experience with a player they sometimes add me as a friend.

Of course a few times when it first happened they just flamed me then blocked me, now I always decline the request. Are they hoping that by blocking me the match making system won't place them with me? Maybe they think blocking players makes  them more likely to be punished by riot? 

Does anyone have an idea on what this might be?

If another thread covers this just point me that way.
